channel.title: uzbl on Dieter's blog
channel.description: Recent content in uzbl on Dieter's blog

item.title: Handing off uzbl to a new project leader
item.description: As of yesterday, Brendan 'bct' Taylor is the new Uzbl project leader / maintainer. Yesterday I did the newspost on uzbl.org which explains the reasoning. I can add it feels pretty weird "giving away" and "leaving behind" a project you spent so much time on and which grew a large (well, for a FOSS side project with a hacker audience) base of users and contributors, and which served as inspiration for various other projects.
